title: Ali Baba Yu Shen Deng
synopsis: Robber's Scimitar was in the legendary desert ruins-Azrod. When digging for treasures, he accidentally alarmed the nightmare in the seal. The nightmare bewitched the scimitar to open the seal, and the nightmare once again resurrected and darkness fell. 　　The seal master Xiao Zhizhi was invited to participate in the auction. A treasure chest from Azrod suddenly released the curse of nightmare, dragging Xiao Zhizhi into a terrible dream. 　　 In order to save Xiaozhizhi’s Ali Baba, he went through the Adventure Collection and judged from the prophecy that the nightmare seal had been loosened, and the terrifying monster was about to be born, and it must be stopped immediately. 　　 After learning this news, Aladdin, a rookie in the adventure world, made a battle with Alibaba. Whoever defeats the Nightmare Lord first, who is the strongest adventurer, begins a competition concerning the reputation of adventurers. 　　 The resurrected Nightmare Lord releases dark energy, turning the scimitar into an invulnerable monster. Ali Baba and Aladdin teamed up to defeat the Scimitar, and finally, with the cooperation of the magic lamp elves and Xiao Sesame, sealed the nightmare again, and the world returned to peace.(translated from douban)
